column2: and I mean everything was expertly prepared and wonderfully delicious. The things we can't stop thinking about now are the walu walu
column4: sake salmon and foi gras. To be fair
column5: there was only one thing we felt so-so about and that was the dessert. It was peanut butter with some kind of apple ice cream. It was good
column7: who cares when you just had your mind blown 9 times in a row?
